籤詩版本二:
Enda wakananga kuDombo Risingafi kuti udzidze Kusafa.Kana ruzivo urwu rwaziviswa namambo.
Denga rebhuruu, zuva nemwedzi zvinogara zvichipenya zvakajeka, uye mukurumbira wemoyo wakarurama unopararira pasi rose.
詩意:
Iyi hexagram chiratidzo chekugamuchira hutungamiri kubva kuvanhu vanokudzwa.
Zvose zvinofamba zvakanaka pamwe chete.
解曰: Pane mavambo nemagumo. Usaenda kumavirira kana kumabvazuva. Shandisa mwoyo wako. Kune vanhu vakawanda vanokudzwa.
籤詩故事一:
◇Liu Zhiyuan akasiya mauto
Liu Zhiyuan (Zhiyuan) aibva kuShatao (Shatuo rudzi).
Liu Zhiyuan nemudzimai wake Li Sanniang vaigara mumba masekuru vake.Sekuru vake vakafungidzira kuti Liu Zhiyuan (Zhiyuan) murombo, saka vakanyengerera Zhiyuan kuti aende kubindu remavise, achitarisira kuti Liu aizodyiwa nemidzimu miviri yemavise.Zhiyuan akatora pfuti usiku, yakarwa nemidzimu yemavise, ikapinda pasi pevhu, ikachera pasi, tora bakatwa nebhuku rehondo.
Akatora bakatwa rake nehunyanzvi hwake hwekurwa, akaonekana kumudzimai wake, ndokupinda muchiuto.Akapotera kuna Yue Xun uye akashanda semumiriri wenhume.
Khitan yakaparadza Jin Dynasty, ichisiya Central Plains isina tenzi.Zhiyuan akava mambo muJinyang.
Nyika yakachinjwa kuva Gare gare Han Dynasty. Ichiri kunzi Tianfu (zita regore) pasina kushandura nguva.
聖意: Musha munogara makachengetedzeka, iye pachake anoshuvira, mari yakanaka, bhizimisi rakanaka, muchato wakanaka, vaviri vakaroorana, mufambi wechirume anodzokera kumunda, hafu yemakonye anokohwewa, zvipfuwo zvitanhatu zvinobudirira. , munhu awanikwa, mhosva inobudirira, kutama kwakanaka, pfuma yakarasika yakanaka, chirwere ndiAnshan, guva rakanaka.
